recipesJson.name: Sweet B Jesus
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: A very nicely sweetened vanilla cream with hints of maple. This is light a fluffy with a nice buttery ness to it. Very good. Steep 3 days. Mixed 70/30. It really donâ€™t need Sweetner. But if you like a a few drops of Supersweet.

reviews.text: This one came up a little short.  A little light on flavor and I gave her about a month steep. Not bad but not great.   You  set the bar pretty high with Butter Dreams.
